ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Journey, Skills & Expertise
ABOUT.QUOTE: Innovating AI-driven solutions that power seamless customer experiences.

EXPERIENCE_SUMMARY.DESCRIPTION: of software development experience in high-performance applications using NodeJS, Python, and AWS, specializing in AI-powered automation, microservices, and cloud-based architectures.

COMPANIES.NAME: Akmazo Akcelerator
COMPANIES.SUBTITLE: Working primarily with [JRNI](https://jrni.com/), a portfolio company of [Akmazo Akcelerator](https://www.akcelerator.io/).

ROLES.TITLE: Lead Software Engineer
ROLES.DESCRIPTION: - Led and delivered the **Check-In Flow's** responsive UI for **JRNI's Staff-Portal**.

ROLES.TITLE: Senior Software Engineer
ROLES.DESCRIPTION:
- Designed and delivered an **Agentic RAG pipeline** for the Customer Support team leveraging internal docs, help docs, API docs and Zendesk input which reduced average TAT by nearly **15 minutes per ticket** (around **20 percent improvement**).
- Contributed and Developed a standalone microservice for **Security Controls** (Rate-Limiting, Whitelisting). It operates inline like a proxy or can be invoked selectively by other services whilst maintaining **low double-digit millisecond latency** using **Fastify** and **Redis**.
- Led the overhaul of the entire **JRNI Kiosk app** by moving from a legacy JS and Webpack setup to a modern **ReactJs + TypeScript + Vite** architecture with revamped QR and code check-in flows, **Progressive Web App (PWA)** support, major performance boosts and a scalable component and CI/CD foundation that modernizes the product for future growth.

PROJECTS.NAME: Support Co-Pilot
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: An **Agentic RAG-powered** customer support assistant that leverages internal docs, help articles, API docs, and Zendesk data to provide intelligent, context-aware responses.

PROJECTS.NAME: Kiosk
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: A modernized **Progressive Web App (PWA)** check-in system for JRNI's **Staff-Portal** built with **ReactJs + TypeScript + Vite** architecture, featuring revamped QR-code and code-based check-in flows, major performance improvements, and a scalable component foundation with CI/CD integration.

ROLES.TITLE: Software Development Engineer 2
ROLES.DESCRIPTION:
- Led **AI-based calling** integration increasing submission rates **18%**
- Built **GenAI** pipelines for automated text/vision processing
- Designed priority-based queue architecture for async processing
- Implemented **RAG** with **Direct-Search** via **LLM function calls**
- Created unified **OAuth** flow for multiple providers
- Optimized load balancer TCP connections to fix **502** errors
- Built operational tools with **Appsmith**

ROLES.TITLE: Software Development Engineer 1
ROLES.DESCRIPTION:
- Fast-tracked to **Team Lead** for **Trivia** product
- Drove **$15.6K** revenue via Microsoft Monetization platform
- Implemented **Redis** caching for Slack rate limits
- Built **DM system** handling **100K+** messages
- Migrated to **SQS** from REST for improved processing
- Created **LLM** routing system for query handling
- Integrated **Portkey** for flexible AI model management

ROLES.TITLE: Software Engineering Intern
ROLES.DESCRIPTION:
- Established testing standards with **Chai**, **Sinon**, and **Mocha**
- Refactored **Trivia** into optimized microservices

PROJECTS.NAME: Trivia
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: A virtual team-building app for Slack and Microsoft Teams that enables organizations to run real-time games, quizzes, puzzles, and polls to foster engagement among remote and hybrid teams.

PROJECTS.NAME: Albus
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: An AI-powered workplace assistant that integrates with various company apps (Slack, Teams, Google Drive, etc.) to deliver instant, secure, context-aware answers to employee queries by searching and synthesizing internal knowledge sources.

PROJECTS.NAME: SpringVerify
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: A background verification platform designed for businesses to automate and streamline employment, education, credit, and KYC checks, supporting bulk uploads, API integrations, and rapid digital onboarding.

EDUCATION.DEGREE: B.E. Computer Science with Specialization in AI and ML

SECTION.TITLE: Featured Projects
SECTION.DESCRIPTION: A collection of my recent work showcasing full-stack development, AI integrations, and innovative solutions.

CARDS.title: Cause List Checker
CARDS.description: **Cause List Checker** is a FastAPI-based web application that automates searching through Punjab and Haryana High Court cause list PDFs for specific case details, fetches comprehensive case information from the court website, and sends automated email notifications with search results to legal professionals.

CARDS.title: Cafe Safar
CARDS.description: **Cafe Safar** is a comprehensive full stack application designed for order management at the restaurant 'Cafe-Safar'. It features distinct user and admin views. Users can place orders, review past orders and transactions, and manage their profiles. Admins have the ability to oversee orders, update the menu, monitor payments, and handle various administrative functions.

CARDS.title: Slack DM Sender
CARDS.description: **Slack DM Sender** is a Slack bot that allows you to send direct messages to users in your workspace, appearing as if sent by you. Ideal for automated communication.

CARDS.title: Run AWS Locally (Docker-Localstack)
CARDS.description: **Run AWS Locally (Docker-Localstack)** is a project that simplifies your local development by emulating AWS cloud services using Localstack within Docker. This setup enables seamless testing and development of AWS-dependent applications locally, supporting S3 and SQS as of now, and ensuring faster feedback loops without incurring cloud costs.

CARDS.title: Gesture-Controlled Interactive Gaming
CARDS.description: **Gesture-Controlled Interactive Gaming** is an innovative computer vision project enabling hand gestures to control a game. Map gestures to W, A, S, D keys for a dynamic, hands-free gaming experience.

META.TITLE: Karan Trehan
META.DESCRIPTION_TEMPLATE: Karan Trehan - Lead Software Engineer & Full Stack Developer | AI Enthusiast. {YEARS}+ years of experience in full-stack development, AI-powered solutions, and cloud-based architectures. Specializing in Python, FastAPI, Node.js, React.js, and AWS.

COOKIE_CONSENT.TITLE: Cookie Notice
COOKIE_CONSENT.DESCRIPTION: This site uses cookies for analytics to understand how visitors interact with the site.

SECTIONS.title: Introduction
SECTIONS.content: This Privacy Policy explains how this portfolio website collects and uses information when you visit. This is a static website that does not collect personal data directly. We are committed to transparency about any data collection that occurs through third party services. We do not control how third party services process data collected through their technologies. Those services act as independent data controllers under their own privacy policies.

SECTIONS.title: Information We Collect
SECTIONS.content:
This website uses **Google Analytics 4 (GA4)** to understand how visitors interact with the site. **We only enable analytics after you provide explicit consent** by clicking "Accept" on the cookie banner.

### URL Parameters (UTM Parameters)

When you visit this website, we automatically capture UTM parameters from the URL (such as `utm_source`, `utm_medium`, `utm_campaign`) if they are present in the link you used to access the site. These parameters are stored temporarily in your browser's sessionStorage (not cookies) and are used for analytics attribution purposes. **These parameters are only sent to Google Analytics after you provide consent.** SessionStorage data is automatically cleared when you close your browser tab or window.

### Analytics Data (After Consent)

When you consent, Google Analytics collects anonymized information such as:

- Pages visited and time spent on pages
- Navigation paths and interactions with site elements
- Browser type, operating system, and device category
- Approximate location at country or city level, IP addresses are anonymized
- UTM parameters for understanding traffic sources

**Purpose**: This data helps us understand website usage patterns and improve the user experience. We do not use this data for marketing, advertising, or profiling.

SECTIONS.title: What We Don't Collect
SECTIONS.content:
This website does not collect any personally identifiable information:

- No names, email addresses, or contact information
- No login credentials or authentication data
- No payment or financial information
- No precise location data
- No tracking across other websites, first party analytics only

This is a static portfolio website with no forms, user accounts, or data input fields.

SECTIONS.title: Cookies and Tracking
SECTIONS.content:
This site enables cookies and browser storage only after you provide consent:

### Analytics Cookies (Google Analytics 4)

These cookies are set and processed by Google only if you click "Accept" on the cookie banner:

- **_ga**: Distinguishes users
- **_ga_<MEASUREMENT_ID>**: Persists session state
- **_gid**: Distinguishes users
- **_gat**: Throttles request rate

### Browser Storage

- **analytics-consent**: Stores your consent preference in localStorage so we do not ask again
- **utm_params**: Temporarily stores UTM parameters from URLs in sessionStorage for analytics attribution. This data is automatically cleared when you close your browser tab or window. **UTM parameters are only sent to Google Analytics after you provide consent.**

### Managing Cookies and Storage

You can control cookies and browser storage through:
- The cookie banner
- Browser settings (to clear cookies and storage)
- The "Change Cookie Preferences" button on this page

Disabling cookies or clearing browser storage will stop analytics tracking but will not affect basic website functionality.

SECTIONS.title: Third-Party Services
SECTIONS.content:
This website uses the following third party services:

### Google Analytics 4

- **Purpose**: Website analytics, enabled only with your consent
- **Data**: Anonymized usage statistics
- **Processing**: Data is collected and processed by Google as an independent data controller
- **Privacy Policy**: [Google Privacy Policy](https://policies.google.com/privacy)
- **Opt-Out**: You can decline cookies on this site or use the Google Analytics opt out browser add on

### GitHub Pages

- **Purpose**: Static website hosting
- **Data**: GitHub may collect basic connection information required to deliver the website
- **Privacy Statement**: [GitHub Privacy Statement](https://docs.github.com/en/site-policy/privacy-policies/github-privacy-statement)
- **Note**: We do not collect or process data through GitHub Pages

### Google Calendar

- **Purpose**: Embedded calendar for scheduling appointments
- **Data**: When using the embedded calendar, you interact directly with Google
- **Processing**: Google handles all data collection and processing for appointments
- **Privacy Policy**: [Google Privacy Policy](https://policies.google.com/privacy)

We do not sell, rent, or trade data to third parties.

SECTIONS.title: Data Retention
SECTIONS.content:
Analytics data collected through Google Analytics is retained for **14 months**, after which it is automatically deleted by Google. We do not export or store this data elsewhere.

Your cookie consent preference is stored in your browser until you clear browser data or reset preferences using the "Change Cookie Preferences" button.

SECTIONS.title: Data Security
SECTIONS.content:
We take reasonable steps to protect your information:

- HTTPS encryption for all data transmission
- Secure hosting via GitHub Pages
- No personal data storage on our servers

No method of transmission over the internet is completely secure.

SECTIONS.title: Your Rights
SECTIONS.content:
You have control over your data:

- Opt out of analytics via the cookie banner
- Withdraw consent using the "Change Cookie Preferences" button
- Clear browser cookies at any time
- Use browser privacy controls or private browsing
- Use the Google Analytics opt out browser add on

SECTIONS.title: Manage Cookie Preferences
SECTIONS.content: You can change your cookie consent preferences at any time. Your current preference is: {CURRENT_PREFERENCE}
SECTIONS.subtitle: Clicking this button will reset your cookie preferences and show the cookie consent banner again. Analytics will remain disabled until new consent is provided.

SECTIONS.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
SECTIONS.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When changes are made, the "Last updated" date will be revised. Continued use of the website indicates acceptance of the updated policy.

SECTIONS.title: Contact
SECTIONS.content:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact:

**Karan Trehan**
Email: [karantrehan3@gmail.com](mailto:karantrehan3@gmail.com)
Website: [https://karantrehan3.github.io](https://karantrehan3.github.io)
